channel.title: 07 Scape
channel.description:
http://services.runescape.com/m=news/2007---old-school-runescape-you-vote
If they were to do this, would you play? Would you be willing to train your stats up again?
Honestly, as much I loved back then, I couldn't see myself restarting which I think is why it's only going to really benefit the pkers. If this is the case, it won't split everyone up which i'm all for because RS is small anyway now.. We don't want a even smaller community.

item.title: 07 Scape
item.dc:creator: @I_Love_College I Love College
item.description:
@I_Love_College wrote:

[quote=“Classic, post:104, topic:484494”][quote author=iCreatedHorror link=topic=602730.msg4234134#msg4234134 date=1361461923]
As much I was excited for this when I heard about, I already lost interest. Thinking back, it was fun because I would be playing with my friends after school (I believe someone said this earlier) and since we’ve all outgrown the game it just wouldn’t be as fun for me; it would only be a short period of nostalgia before it grew boring.
[/quote]
It was me who said that :)[/quote]
Exactly how i feel.

Read full topic

item.title: 07 Scape
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Mitko, post:90, topic:484494”]Completely agree with OP.

Why would I dump all of my hard work on my current account just to “re-live” some moments of the past. They won’t be fun either. We all remember that sweet old RuneScape when we would get home from school and play with friends, being ~10 year olds. I personally see myself having fun the first days just by exploring the areas a bit only because it will remind me of some fun moments from back in the days and that’s it.[/quote]

Exactly what the free 1 month trial to all participating voters is for.

Read full topic

item.title: 07 Scape
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Completely agree with OP.

Why would I dump all of my hard work on my current account just to “re-live” some moments of the past. They won’t be fun either. We all remember that sweet old RuneScape when we would get home from school and play with friends, being ~10 year olds. I personally see myself having fun the first days just by exploring the areas a bit only because it will remind me of some fun moments from back in the days and that’s it.

Read full topic

item.title: 07 Scape
item.dc:creator: @ciaran6889 ciaran6889
item.description:
@ciaran6889 wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:81, topic:484494”][quote author=imthenull link=topic=602730.msg4224676#msg4224676 date=1360948430]

Where did you guys get 16hours from? It’s only been up for 6.

The website.

Old School RuneScape Servers: Poll Now Live

17 hours ago [/quote]

This just told me that you don’t even play Runescape. Infact, I’m not going to say what I wanted to. Whenever they make a new post, it always says that it has been uploaded at midnight GMT when it really hasn’t.

Well, it has been uploaded at that time i’m guessing, they just don’t show it until they’re ready in the morning. No one would of been able to vote until the thread had been posted on forums/unhidden on main page. Real time it started was 11am.[/quote]
yup it defo hasnt been up 17 hours

Read full topic

[/quote]
The website.

[quote]
Old School RuneScape Servers: Poll Now Live

17 hours ago [/quote][/quote]

This just told me that you don’t even play Runescape. Infact, I’m not going to say what I wanted to. Whenever they make a new post, it always says that it has been uploaded at midnight GMT when it really hasn’t.

Well, it has been uploaded at that time i’m guessing, they just don’t show it until they’re ready in the morning. No one would of been able to vote until the thread had been posted on forums/unhidden on main page. Real time it started was 11am.
